lolChatClientPackage
Class LoLChatsClient

java.lang.Object
  lolChatClientPackage.LoLChatsClient
Direct Known Subclasses:
VerySimpleChatServer
public class LoLChatsClient
extends java.lang.Object

Creates the GUI and handles connecting to the server, sending messages to the server, creating a message log, and saving the the contacts list.

Author:
Luis Gonzalez, Clayton Walker

Nested Class Summary
 class LoLChatsClient.addContactButtonListener
          Adds a contact to the contact array list upon button press
 class LoLChatsClient.IncomingReader
          Reads the message typed in to the application sending to the server and appending to the message log file.
 class LoLChatsClient.logInButtonListener
          Retrieves the contact list upon logging in and launches the messaging client.
 class LoLChatsClient.logInTerminateButtonListener
          Terminates the button upon button press.
 class LoLChatsClient.logOutButtonListener
          Kills the current main window session and restarts the program with a new log in window
 class LoLChatsClient.registerContactButtonListener
          Opens up a new window that allows the user to add a new contact.
 class LoLChatsClient.SendButtonListener
          Sends a message typed in by the user to the server on button press with who sent it and time stamp.
 class LoLChatsClient.terminateButtonListener
          Saves the contact list to a file through serializable then terminates the application completely.
